code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";const useFetch=(url,isDataChanged)=>{const[data,setData]=useState(null);const[isPending,setIsPending]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch(url).then(res=>{if(!res.ok){throw Error('Error fetching cars data');}return res.json();}).then(data=>{setData(data);setIsPending(false);setError(null);}).catch(err=>{setIsPending(false);setError(err.message);});},[url,isDataChanged]);return{data,isPending,error};};export default useFetch;
